planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.
b. Move toward nearest undefeated character, if Bossk can reach their space.
c. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, face-up/face-down contact).
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Fight a combat against another player in this space. If Bossk wins, gain 1 fame.
c. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, face-up contact).
special: Discard top cards from job and luxury market decks. Then shuffle this AI deck.
